lang.langstring: Select the pages you wish to save as a PDF by clicking on them.
Or enter the page numbers manually. Separate numbers using semicolons. Define ranges using 'from-to': e.g. 10-20.

Warning
Due to technical limitations it is not possible to save more than $1 pages at a time. Please reduce your selection (you have currently selected $2 pages).
Alternatively, save the whole book by clicking the 'Save complete book' button.
